title: My Lunar Revel Shop is not showing in my client
body: For me when I log into my account and get on the main page there is nothing there that is showing the revel shop or anything. If I'm just not seeing it I would appreciate help finding it, or fixing the problem here.

replies.body: There isn't a personalized shop currently for Lunar Revel.  We do have some special event stuff going on right now, like [Lunar Revel hextech crafting](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/lunar-revel-crafting).  Let me know if that clears things up!
does this hextech stuff mean we're never getting the personalized shops again?
